creators.bio: Helping fitness coaches get clients with Instagram & Facebook Ads. Instagram Authority Funnel creator. DM 'GROW' to get started.

topContent.caption:
If you've given up on Facebook ads for your fitness business... you're not alone.

But here's what changed for 3 coaches last month:

Coach 1: $0 → $8K/mo in 47 days
Coach 2: Went from 3 clients to 22 in 60 days
Coach 3: First $15K month after 2 years of trying

The difference? They stopped boosting posts and started running a real Instagram Authority Funnel.

DM 'ADS' if you want me to map out your funnel for free.

topContent.caption:
I spent $127 on this ad and made $4,200 in 9 days.

Here's the exact breakdown:
- $127 ad spend
- 47 leads generated
- 12 DM conversations
- 3 new clients at $1,400/each

That's a 33x return.

The secret? I didn't send them to a landing page. I sent them to my Instagram profile.

Want me to show you how? DM 'FUNNEL'

creators.bio: Built $200M+ in biz. Invest in companies that do $3M-$50M. Free content to help you grow. Author of $100M Offers & $100M Leads.

topContent.caption:
The #1 reason your offer doesn't sell:

It's not your audience.
It's not your funnel.
It's not your ads.

It's that your offer sounds exactly like everyone else's.

Here's how to fix it in 10 minutes:

1. Name the specific result (not a vague transformation)
2. Add a timeframe people believe
3. Remove the biggest risk with a guarantee
4. Stack bonuses worth more than the price

Do this and watch what happens.
topContent.hookFramework: Pattern Interrupt (elimination list) → Diagnosis → 4-Step Fix → Open Loop CTA
topContent.visualHook: Close-up face with text overlay: 'Your offer doesn't sell because...'
topContent.textHook: The #1 reason your offer doesn't sell:
topContent.spokenHook: The number one reason your offer doesn't sell has nothing to do with your audience
topContent.summary: Classic Hormozi style — eliminates common excuses, identifies real problem (commoditized offer), delivers actionable 4-step fix. Simple, direct, high-value.
topContent.cta: Do this and watch what happens

topContent.caption:

Slide 1: The Setup
Slide 2: The Discovery (ask, don't tell)
Slide 3: The Transition
Slide 4: The Close (make it obvious)
Slide 5: The Follow-Up

topContent.caption:
Stop saying 'pick my brain.'

Say: 'I have 3 specific questions. Can I buy 30 minutes of your time?'

Why this works:
- Shows you respect their time
- Proves you've done homework
- Makes it easy to say yes
- Creates obligation to deliver value back

The way you ask determines what you get.
topContent.hookFramework: Contrarian Command → Better Alternative → 4 Reasons Why → Philosophical Close
topContent.visualHook: Red X over 'pick my brain' text, green checkmark on replacement
topContent.spokenHook: If you ever say pick my brain to someone you admire, stop
topContent.summary: Takes a common networking phrase and reframes it. Tactical advice that's immediately actionable. The contrarian hook drives comments from both sides.
topContent.cta: The way you ask determines what you get

topContent.caption:
The fastest way to $10K/mo as a coach:

1. Pick ONE problem you solve better than anyone
2. Find 100 people who have that problem RIGHT NOW
3. Offer to solve it for $1,000
4. Deliver so well they tell 3 friends
5. Repeat

You don't need a funnel. You don't need ads. You need 10 clients who love you.

That's it. Go do it.
topContent.hookFramework: Promise of Speed → Numbered Steps → Anti-Complexity → Command CTA
topContent.visualHook: Green money counter animation, bold text '$10K/mo'
topContent.textHook: The fastest way to $10K/mo as a coach:
topContent.spokenHook: Here's the fastest way to ten K a month as a coach
topContent.summary: Strips away complexity. 5 simple steps anyone can follow. The anti-funnel, anti-ads message resonates with overwhelmed coaches. Drives massive engagement.

creators.bio: Helping course creators & coaches get clients with Meta Ads. Andromeda-era strategies. Free Skool community: skool.com/max

topContent.caption:
Meta's Andromeda update changed everything.

Broad targeting now BEATS lookalike audiences 90% of the time.

Here's what to do:
1. Kill your lookalikes
2. Go broad (age + country only)
3. Let Andromeda's AI find your buyers
4. Focus your budget on creative testing

I've tested this across 40+ accounts. The data doesn't lie.
topContent.hookFramework: News Hook (algorithm change) → Contrarian Data Point → 4-Step Action Plan → Authority Close

topContent.spokenHook: If you're still using lookalike audiences, you need to hear this
topContent.summary: Positions as early adopter of Meta's algorithm changes. Specific, actionable advice. The '40+ accounts' proof point builds credibility.

topContent.caption:
Stop trying to get 1,000 members in your Skool community.

You only need 30 paying members at $100/mo to make $3K/mo.

Or 30 members at $300/mo to make $9K/mo.

Or 30 VIPs at $1,000/mo to make $30K/mo.

Same 30 people. Different offer.

Focus on depth, not width.

topContent.summary: Simple math that challenges the 'more members' mindset. The tier comparison shows the same 30 people can be worth $3K or $30K. Directly relevant to Dan's model.

creators.bio: Scaling to 7 figs with paid ads & automation. Founder of Scaling With Systems. Helped 5,000+ business owners.

topContent.caption:
Every coach I know making $50K+/mo does these 3 things:

1. They DON'T do sales calls (they close in DMs or applications)
2. They charge $3K+ minimum (low-ticket is a trap)
3. They run ONE funnel, not five

The simplicity is the strategy.

Most coaches fail because they're running 5 half-built systems instead of 1 great one.

Which of these 3 is your biggest gap? Comment below.

topContent.caption:

- Removed 4 sales reps ($24K/mo in payroll)

- Monthly revenue increased 15%

People don't want to be 'sold.' They want to be heard and guided.

AI does that better than most sales reps.

DM 'AI' if you want to see how it works.

creators.bio: Founder of Skool.com. Teaching consultants to get clients online since 2014. $100M+ in revenue.

topContent.caption:
The coaching industry is broken.

Everyone's selling $10K programs with 200 students and 1 coach.

That's not coaching. That's a webinar with a payment plan.

Real coaching means:
- You know their name
- You know their business
- You give specific feedback
- You're available when they're stuck

If you can't do that with your current model, your model is wrong.

Fix the model. Then scale it.
topContent.hookFramework: Industry Callout → Vivid Comparison → Definition Reframe → Standard List → Model Challenge
topContent.visualHook: Red text: 'The coaching industry is BROKEN' overlaid on luxury car footage
topContent.spokenHook: The coaching industry is fundamentally broken and here's why
topContent.summary: Calls out the overcrowded, impersonal coaching model. Redefines what real coaching means. Positions quality over scale — aligns with Dan's intimate VIP approach.
topContent.cta: Fix the model. Then scale it.

topContent.caption:

topContent.caption:
Why Skool is eating the course industry alive:

1. Community > Course (people stay for people, not PDFs)
2. Gamification drives engagement (levels, leaderboards)
3. One tool replaces 5 (community + course + calendar + chat + classroom)
4. Monthly recurring > one-time (predictable revenue)
5. Free communities = unlimited top-of-funnel

The coaches winning right now aren't building courses.
They're building communities.

Join the free community: skool.com/games
